annotations.description: Irish whiskey is such a diverse spirit, but the more classic, light and smooth style is perfect for cocktails. It provides a malty, biscuity backbone but wit...
annotations.title: 3 Very Different Irish Whiskey Cocktails

textContent:
30ml (1oz) blended Scotch whisky
30ml (1oz) blended Irish whiskey
20ml (2/30z) fresh lemon juice
15ml (1/2oz) orgeat
Orange twist to garnish

Shake and strain into coupe
Garnish with orange twist

title: Cameron's Kick
